Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Specimen Type(s): Gynecological specimens collected in BD SurePath Preservative Fluid
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA technology on the BD Viper System for direct qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in swabs, urine, and gynecological specimens with the BD Viper System to aid in the diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals
